Comment: >“Well, I have a slightly different view. I agree with you that they voted for him because they felt better, in my opinion, about-, they looked at the last four years under Biden-Harris and said, ‘not good.’ And they looked and remembered the four years under President Trump and said those were a lot better. How many times did we hear the question this time last year "are you better off now than 4 years ago?"
